price: Ɔbεka sε: “Me Wura Nyankopͻn adεn na Wanyane me onifirani wͻ aberε a na anka mehunu adeε?”
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرۡتَنِيٓ أَعۡمَىٰ وَقَدۡ كُنتُ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi lima ḥashartanī aʿmā waqad kuntu baṣīran
